title: Surface Pro
content:
{{Short description|Line of 2-in-1 detachables developed by Microsoft running Microsoft Windows operating system}}
[[File:Microsoft Surface logo.svg|220px|right]]
{{surface models}}
The '''Surface Pro''' is a line of [[2-in-1 laptop|2-in-1 detachable]] devices marketed by [[Microsoft]], as a sub-brand of their [[Microsoft Surface|Surface]] devices. Several models have been produced:
* [[Surface Pro (1st generation)]], released in 2013
* [[Surface Pro 2]], released in 2013
* [[Surface Pro 3]], released in 2014
* [[Surface Pro 4]], released in 2015
* [[Surface Pro (2017)|Surface Pro]], fifth generation, released in 2017
* [[Surface Pro 6]], released in 2018
* [[Surface Pro 7]], released in 2019
** Surface Pro 7+, released in 2021
* [[Surface Pro X]], released in 2019
* [[Surface Pro 8]], released in 2021
* [[Surface Pro 9]], released in 2022
* [[Surface Pro 10]], released in 2024
* [[Surface Pro (11th generation)|Surface Pro]], 11th generation, released in 2024

[[Category:Computer-related introductions in 2013]]
